actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide certain veterans insured under the provisions of section 722 (a) of title 38, United States Code (service disabled veterans' insurance), with the opportunity to purchase an additional $10,000 of such insurance.

summary.text: Provides veterans holding service disabled veterans' insurance policies the opportunity to purchase an additional $10,000 of such insurance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide certain veterans insured under the provisions of section 722 (a) of title 38, United States Code (service disabled veterans' insurance), with the opportunity to purchase an additional $10,000 of such insurance.
